data.actual_result: Usage access screen appears when you are trying to disable it.
data.expected_result: Usage access should pop up when you are enabling it, as it gives instructions on how to ENABLE it.
data.short_description: Usage access screen only appears when you are trying to disable the game detection, instead of enabling it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 8.0.1. - Enable Game Detection. Notice how the usage access doesn't pop up anymore. - Then, disable it. Notice how usage access pops up.
